name: Drugulation
description:
WARNING: THE FOLLOWING GAME CONTAINS CONSUMPTION OR USE OF ILLEGAL DRUGS AND DISTURBING IMAGES. VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVICED Story

Experience the heaviest drug in the universe without actually trying it! 

Drugulation wipes your definition of reality and folds the fabric of your surroundings, and the fun part is that you have a double barrel shotgun too!

Want to get out of the trip? No worries, you just have to find 4 Golden Bowling Pins from giant bosses in 4 'planets'.

Easy enough, right?

Development

Drugulation is made for Mystery Box Jam. All 3D Models, Images, Sounds, Music and even Fonts in this game are from the Mystery Box; Even in most cases, overall visual and colors of assets are kept the same!

Please notice that because of jam time; Drugulation is still in development and I will try my best to finish it until this Sunday (11/27). You can follow me and get a notification when I've uploaded it.

If you really want to try what's available now; there is an early Alpha version below, but I recommend that you wait and download the full version.
